reviews.review: This game is really fun. But steam is pretty iffy. My trust factor has hit rock bottom and I can't get back up. I have not used hacks nor have I played with anyone using hacks. I can't seem to fix it so now I just can't play with my friends anymore. This is the only game I really played at all and since I recently moved, it's how I could connect with my friends. Not anymore though. Even after buying prime I still have this issue. It sucks.
Excelente jogo para passar o tempo

Good Shooting game. Big learning curve with shooting. Way to many hackers. Also "Smurfs" Which are higher ranking players that are scared to play in there own rank ( because they will get destroyed ) and move down to silver to dominate newer people.
